itunes:title: Losing $10,000 In One Minute
title: Losing $10,000 In One Minute
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
itunes:summary:
Ilya brings in a 600 pound fire hydrant by himself, Joe discusses a bank robbery from his former job, and the aftermath of leaking your own phone number. Plus Ilya loses $10,000 from gambling. Please rate us a 5 star also!! If you're reading this comment "Joe is cuter than Ilya"
